name: U.S. R&D expenditures, by performing sector and source of funds: 2010–21
description: U.S. R&D expenditures, by performing sector and source of funds: 2010–21

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: value
variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of current and constant 2012 dollars

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Data are based on annual reports by performers. Expenditure levels for higher education, federal government, and nonfederal government performers are calendar year approximations based on fiscal year data.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, National Patterns of R&D Resources (annual series).
